name: Traffic Direction
values: EB - Eastbound, ME - Median, NB - Northbound, SB - Southbound, WB - Westbound

name: Frequency: Prior to Commencing linemarking works
Acceptance Criteria: All personnel on site have been inducted to the CRU Site.
Record of Conformity: ITP signed, Site induction signed.
1.2 Safety measures are in place, SWMS undertaken
Frequency: Prior to Commencing linemarking works
Acceptance Criteria: As per Fulton Hogan Safety Strategy. All personnel on site to have signed onto relevant SWMS before commencing work.
Reference Documents: Health and Safety Co-Ordination Plan
Record of Conformity: ITP signed, SWMS(s) signed
1.3 Check that current revision drawings are being used
Frequency: Prior to Commencing linemarking works
Acceptance Criteria: Issued For Construction (IFC) drawings, & latest available revision used.
Record of Conformity: ITP signed, Latest revision IFC drawings
1.4 Confirm understanding of current EMP related to the work area and that all prescribed environemental controls are in place
Frequency: Prior to Commencing linemarking works
Acceptance Criteria: All environmental measures to be implemented as per construction environmental management plan
Reference Documents: CEMP, Site induction, PS1200.03
Inspection / Test Method: Document review & Site inspection
Frequency: Prior to Commencing linemarking works
Acceptance Criteria: Approved TMP and MOA in use
Inspection / Test Method: Document review & Site inspection
Frequency: Prior to commencing site preparation
Acceptance Criteria: Line marking material to comply with minimum requirements as specified in VicRoads Spec 721.A05, VR721.A13, VR721.A14,  & PS3070.05
Record of Conformity: ITP signed, Material compliance
Acceptance Criteria: Site to be prepared by removing any foreign materials and debris within reasonable limits.
Inspection / Test Method: Document review & Site inspection
Acceptance Criteria: If redundant/unsuitable pavement markings to be removed, removal methodology to be approved by superintendent
Inspection / Test Method: Document review & Site inspection
2.4 Set out of line markings; dimensions and spacings
Acceptance Criteria: Painting/application of material shall not commence until the Superintendent has inspected the setout and installation timeframes are adherred to.
Inspection / Test Method: Document review & Site inspection
• Consent to proceed by Superintendent OR written exemption granted
Acceptance Criteria: If required, painted pavement marking is to be applied by a self propelled machine, with the minimum requirements for paint and glass to be as per table 721.D021
Inspection / Test Method: Document review & Site inspection

Acceptance Criteria: all line marking shall be applied using a self propelled ride-on machine including statcon marking unless otherwise approved, with the minimum requirements for long life materials and glass beads to be as per table 721.E021
Inspection / Test Method: Document review & Site inspection
Acceptance Criteria: Work to be protected by appropriate means until it is trafficable.
Inspection / Test Method: Document review & Site inspection
Acceptance Criteria: Contractor to measure level of retroflectivity, with the average of six test site retroflectivity values for each lot.
Inspection / Test Method: Document review & Site inspection
Record of Conformity: ITP signed, Test report
Acceptance Criteria: Colour match tests for white & yellow markings to be conducted as per 721.A14, with results  forwarded to the superintendent no later than 5 days from testing.
Inspection / Test Method: Document review & Site inspection
Record of Conformity: ITP signed, Test report
Acceptance Criteria: Survey conformance report to show line marking applied as per tolerances shown in table 721.A101.
Inspection / Test Method: Document review & Site inspection
Record of Conformity: ITP signed, Survey report
Acceptance Criteria: Work to comply with specified requirements as detailed in VR721.A12
Inspection / Test Method: Document review & Site inspection

Acceptance Criteria: All new markings to have job completion report forwarded to the superintendent, with a retroflectivity report completed and forwarded to the superintendent showing the retroflectivity for each test lot.
Inspection / Test Method: Document review & Site inspection
Record of Conformity: ITP signed, Reports
